handlers.code:
local initialDelay = 3
local maxWaitTime = 90

local slots = {}
slots.containers = {}
local Utilities = _G.Utilities
local InventoryCommon = _G.InventoryCommon

slots.screen = screen
slots.databank = databank

local module = "inventory-report-scanner"
slots.screen = Utilities.loadSlot(slots.screen, "ScreenUnit", nil, module, "screen", true)
slots.databank = Utilities.loadSlot(slots.databank, "DataBankUnit", slots.screen, module, "databank")

if slots.screen then
    slots.screen.setHTML("")
    slots.screen.activate()
end

local debugIndex = 0
local debugFontSize = 2.5
local function debugPrint(msg)
    if slots.screen then
        slots.screen.addText(0, debugIndex * debugFontSize, debugFontSize, msg)
        debugIndex = debugIndex + 1
    end
    system.print(msg)
end

-- Timing variables
local startTime = system.getArkTime()
local updateContentCallTime = nil
local contentUpdatedTime = nil
local processingStartTime = nil
local processingEndTime = nil
local scanStartTime = nil

-- Only scan slot8
if unit["slot8"] and type(unit["slot8"]) == "table" and unit["slot8"].getClass then
    local className = unit["slot8"].getClass()
    if string.match(className, "Container") then
        slots.containers["slot8"] = unit["slot8"]
        debugPrint("Found container in slot8: " .. className)
    else
        debugPrint("slot8 is not a Container, it is: " .. className)
    end
else
    debugPrint("slot8 is not linked or not valid")
end

if not slots.containers["slot8"] then
    local msg = "No container found in slot8 to test."
    debugPrint(msg)
    assert(false, msg)
end

local containerStatus = {}
for _, container in pairs(slots.containers) do
    containerStatus[container] = {
        available = false,
        complete = false,
    }
end

local function processContainer(container)
    processingStartTime = system.getArkTime()
    debugPrint(">>> PROCESSING START TIME: " .. string.format("%.3f", processingStartTime))
    
    debugPrint(">>> PROCESSING CONTAINER ID: " .. tostring(container.getLocalId()))
    local itemsList = container.getContent()
    debugPrint(">>> Items count: " .. tostring(#itemsList))

    local id = container.getLocalId()
    local selfMass = container.getSelfMass()
    local maxVolume = container.getMaxVolume()

    InventoryCommon.removeContainerFromDb(slots.databank, id)

    local itemData, name, quantity, unitMass, unitVolume, isMaterial
    for _, item in pairs(itemsList) do
        itemData = system.getItem(item.id)
        if name then
            debugPrint(string.format("Error: Multiple item types in container id %d: %s, %s, ...", id, name, itemData.displayName))
            containerStatus[container].complete = true
            processingEndTime = system.getArkTime()
            return
        else
            name = string.lower(itemData.displayName)
            quantity = item.quantity
            unitMass = itemData.unitMass
            unitVolume = itemData.unitVolume
            isMaterial = itemData.type == "material"
        end
    end
    if not name then
        debugPrint(string.format("Error: No items in container id %d", id))
        containerStatus[container].complete = true
        processingEndTime = system.getArkTime()
        return
    end

    local itemDetails = {
        unitMass = unitMass,
        unitVolume = unitVolume,
        isMaterial = isMaterial,
    }
    local itemString = json.encode(itemDetails)
    slots.databank.setStringValue(name, itemString)

    local itemContainersKey = name .. InventoryCommon.constants.CONTAINER_SUFFIX
    local currentContainers = InventoryCommon.jsonToIntList(slots.databank.getStringValue(itemContainersKey))
    table.insert(currentContainers, id)
    slots.databank.setStringValue(itemContainersKey, InventoryCommon.intListToJson(currentContainers))

    local density = container.getItemsMass() / quantity
    local containerOptimization = density / unitMass
    local containerKey = InventoryCommon.constants.CONTAINER_PREFIX .. id
    local containerDetails = {
        selfMass = selfMass,
        maxVolume = maxVolume,
        optimization = containerOptimization,
    }
    local containerString = json.encode(containerDetails)
    slots.databank.setStringValue(containerKey, containerString)

    debugPrint(string.format("Registered \"%s\" to container id: %d, optimization: %.2f", name, id, containerOptimization))

    containerStatus[container].complete = true
    processingEndTime = system.getArkTime()
    debugPrint(">>> PROCESSING END TIME: " .. string.format("%.3f", processingEndTime))
end

function _G.exitWithSummary(reason)
    unit.stopTimer("startDelay")
    unit.stopTimer("timeout")
    
    local endTime = system.getArkTime()
    debugPrint("*** Ending: " .. reason .. " ***")
    debugPrint("===================================")
    debugPrint("TIMING SUMMARY:")
    debugPrint("Script start: " .. string.format("%.3f", startTime))
    if scanStartTime then
        debugPrint("Scan started: " .. string.format("%.3f", scanStartTime))
        debugPrint("Initial delay: " .. string.format("%.3f", scanStartTime - startTime) .. "s")
    end
    if updateContentCallTime then
        debugPrint("updateContent called: " .. string.format("%.3f", updateContentCallTime))
    end
    if contentUpdatedTime then
        debugPrint("contentUpdated callback: " .. string.format("%.3f", contentUpdatedTime))
        if updateContentCallTime then
            debugPrint("Call to callback delay: " .. string.format("%.3f", contentUpdatedTime - updateContentCallTime) .. "s")
        end
    else
        debugPrint("contentUpdated callback: NEVER RECEIVED")
    end
    if processingStartTime then
        debugPrint("Processing started: " .. string.format("%.3f", processingStartTime))
    end
    if processingEndTime then
        debugPrint("Processing ended: " .. string.format("%.3f", processingEndTime))
        if processingStartTime then
            debugPrint("Processing duration: " .. string.format("%.3f", processingEndTime - processingStartTime) .. "s")
        end
    end
    debugPrint("Total execution time: " .. string.format("%.3f", endTime - startTime) .. "s")
    debugPrint("===================================")
    if contentUpdatedTime then
        InventoryCommon.validateDb(slots.databank)
    end
    unit.exit()
end

function _G.checkTimeout()
    local now = system.getArkTime()
    if not contentUpdatedTime then
        debugPrint("*** Timeout reached after " .. maxWaitTime .. "s without callback")
        _G.exitWithSummary("Timeout - no callback received")
    end
end

function _G.startScanning()
    unit.stopTimer("startDelay")
    scanStartTime = system.getArkTime()
    debugPrint("*** Initial delay complete, starting scan at: " .. string.format("%.3f", scanStartTime))
    
    -- Call updateContent ONCE (respecting 30s API rate limit)
    for _, container in pairs(slots.containers) do
        updateContentCallTime = system.getArkTime()
        debugPrint("*** Calling updateContent (ONCE) at: " .. string.format("%.3f", updateContentCallTime))
        debugPrint("*** NOTE: API has 30s rate limit - should respond quickly if cooldown expired")
        container.updateContent()
        break
    end
    
    -- Set timeout timer
    unit.setTimer("timeout", maxWaitTime)
    debugPrint("*** Waiting up to " .. maxWaitTime .. "s for callback...")
end

function _G.contentUpdated(slot)
    contentUpdatedTime = system.getArkTime()
    debugPrint("!!! contentUpdated for slot: " .. tostring(slot) .. " at: " .. string.format("%.3f", contentUpdatedTime))
    debugPrint("!!! SUCCESS! Callback received!")
    if slots.containers[slot] then
        containerStatus[slots.containers[slot]].available = true
        
        for _, container in pairs(slots.containers) do
            if containerStatus[container].available and not containerStatus[container].complete then
                processContainer(container)
            end
        end
        
        local allComplete = true
        for _, container in pairs(slots.containers) do
            if not containerStatus[container].complete then
                allComplete = false
                break
            end
        end
        
        if allComplete then
            _G.exitWithSummary("All containers complete")
        end
    end
end

debugPrint("===================================")
debugPrint("SLOT 8 TEST - Respecting 30s API Limit")
debugPrint("Start time: " .. string.format("%.3f", startTime))
debugPrint("Initial delay: " .. initialDelay .. "s")
debugPrint("Max wait for callback: " .. maxWaitTime .. "s")
debugPrint("Strategy: Single updateContent call")
debugPrint("API Limit: 30s between calls per container")
debugPrint("===================================")
unit.setTimer("startDelay", initialDelay)

if _G.Utilities then
    return
end
_G.Utilities = {}

local SI_PREFIXES = {"", "k", "M", "G", "T", "P", "E", "Z", "Y"}
function _G.Utilities.printableNumber(value, units)
    if not value or value == 0 then
        return "0.0", units
    end

    local adjustedValue = math.abs(value)
    local sign = value / adjustedValue
    local factor = 1
    while adjustedValue >= 999.5 and factor < #SI_PREFIXES do
        adjustedValue = adjustedValue / 1000
        factor = factor + 1
    end

    if adjustedValue < 9.95 then
        return string.format("%.1f", sign * math.floor(adjustedValue * 10 + 0.5) / 10), SI_PREFIXES[factor] .. units
    end
    return string.format("%.0f", sign * math.floor(adjustedValue + 0.5)), SI_PREFIXES[factor] .. units
end

function _G.Utilities.findFirstSlot(slotClass, exclude)
    if type(slotClass) ~= "table" then
        slotClass = {slotClass}
    end
    exclude = exclude or {}

    for key, value in pairs(unit) do

        for _, exc in pairs(exclude) do
            if value == exc then
                goto continueOuter
            end
        end

        if value and type(value) == "table" and value.getClass then
            for _, class in pairs(slotClass) do
                if string.match(value.getClass(), class) ~= nil then
                    return value, key
                end
            end
        end

        ::continueOuter::
    end

    return nil, nil
end

local function assertValid(valid, message, screen)
    if not valid then
        if screen and screen.setCenteredText and type(screen.setCenteredText) == "function" then
            screen.setCenteredText(message)
        end
        error(message)
    end
end

function _G.Utilities.loadSlot(provided, targetClass, errorScreen, moduleName, mappedSlotName, optional, optionalMessage)
    if type(targetClass) ~= "table" then
        targetClass = {targetClass}
    end
    local slotName

    local typedSlot = provided
    if not (typedSlot and type(typedSlot) == "table" and typedSlot.getClass) then
        typedSlot, slotName = _G.Utilities.findFirstSlot(targetClass)
        if not optional then
            assertValid(typedSlot, string.format("%s: %s link not found.", moduleName, mappedSlotName), errorScreen)
        end

        if typedSlot then
            system.print(string.format("Slot %s mapped to %s %s.", slotName, moduleName, mappedSlotName))
        elseif optionalMessage and string.len(optionalMessage) > 0 then
            system.print(string.format("%s: %s", moduleName, optionalMessage))
        end
    else
        local class = typedSlot.getClass()
        local valid = false
        for _, tClass in pairs(targetClass) do
            valid = valid or class == tClass
        end
        assertValid(valid, string.format("%s %s slot is of type: %s", moduleName, mappedSlotName, class), errorScreen)
    end
    return typedSlot
end

local useParameterSettings = false
_G.Utilities.USE_PARAMETER_SETTINGS = useParameterSettings

function _G.Utilities.getPreference(databank, key, defaultValue)
    local isBool = type(defaultValue) == "boolean"
    local isNumber = type(defaultValue) == "number"
    local prefValue

    if databank then
        if databank.hasKey(key) == 1 and not _G.Utilities.USE_PARAMETER_SETTINGS then
            if isBool then
                prefValue = databank.getIntValue(key) == 1
            elseif isNumber then
                prefValue = databank.getFloatValue(key)
            else
                prefValue = databank.getStringValue(key)
            end
        else
            prefValue = defaultValue
        end

        if isBool then
            local storeValue = 0
            if prefValue then
                storeValue = 1
            end
            databank.setIntValue(key, storeValue)
        elseif isNumber then
            databank.setFloatValue(key, tonumber(prefValue))
        else
            databank.setStringValue(key, prefValue)
        end
    else
        prefValue = defaultValue
    end

    return prefValue
end

return _G.Utilities

if _G.InventoryCommon then
    return
end
_G.InventoryCommon = {}

local constants = {}
constants.SOURCE_CORE_CONTAINER = "core container"
constants.SOURCE_CONTAINER_VOLUME_ONLY = "container volume"
constants.CONTAINER_SUFFIX = ".c"
constants.CONTAINER_PREFIX = "c."
_G.InventoryCommon.constants = constants

function _G.InventoryCommon.jsonToIntList(json)
    local listElements = {}

    for element in string.gmatch(json, "%d+") do
        listElements[#listElements + 1] = tonumber(element)
    end

    return listElements
end

function _G.InventoryCommon.intListToJson(list)
    return string.format("[%s]", table.concat(list, ","))
end

local CONTAINERS_DB_PATTERN = string.format([[.+%%%s]], constants.CONTAINER_SUFFIX)
function _G.InventoryCommon.removeContainerFromDb(databank, containerId)
    local containerList, prefix, suffix, replaceText, changed
    for _, itemContainer in pairs(databank.getKeyList()) do
        if not string.match(itemContainer, CONTAINERS_DB_PATTERN) then
            goto continue
        end
        containerList = databank.getStringValue(itemContainer)

        changed = false
        repeat
            prefix, suffix = string.match(containerList, "(%D)%s*" .. containerId .. "%s*(%D)")
            if not prefix then
                break
            end

            if prefix == suffix then
                replaceText = prefix
            elseif prefix == "," then
                replaceText = suffix
            elseif suffix == "," then
                replaceText = prefix
            elseif prefix == "[" and suffix == "]" then
                replaceText = "[]"
            end

            if prefix == "[" then
                prefix = "%["
            end

            containerList = string.gsub(containerList, prefix .. containerId .. suffix, replaceText)
            changed = true
        until not prefix

        if changed then
            databank.setStringValue(itemContainer, containerList)
        end

        ::continue::
    end
end

local ITEM_CONTAINER_PATTERN = ".-%" .. constants.CONTAINER_SUFFIX .. "$"
function _G.InventoryCommon.validateDb(databank)
    local keyCount = {}
    local containerCount = {}
    for _, key in pairs(databank.getKeyList()) do
        keyCount[key] = (keyCount[key] or 0) + 1

        if string.match(key, ITEM_CONTAINER_PATTERN) then
            for _, containerId in pairs(InventoryCommon.jsonToIntList(databank.getStringValue(key))) do
                containerCount[containerId] = (containerCount[containerId] or 0) + 1
            end
        end
    end
    for key, count in pairs(keyCount) do
        if count > 1 then
            system.print(string.format("Duplicate key: %s (%d)", key, count))
        end
    end
    for containerId, count in pairs(containerCount) do
        if count > 1 then
            system.print(string.format("Duplicate container mapping: %s (%d)", containerId, count))
        end
    end
end

return _G.InventoryCommon
